product_name: Mavic Cosmic Carbone SLS Wheelset with Tires
long_description: A mix of carbon fiber and aluminum with fast Yksion Pro tires, the Mavic Cosmic Carbone SLS Wheelset delivers a featherweight, aerodynamic advantage for serious riders, racers and triathletes.
short_description: A mix of carbon fiber and aluminum with fast Yksion Pro tires, the Mavic Cosmic Carbone SLS Wheelset delivers a featherweight, aerodynamic advantage for serious riders, racers and triathletes.
